properties.displayName: Remote File Download Via Desktopimgdownldr Utility
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "/lockscreenurl:http" and FolderPath endswith "\\desktopimgdownldr.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\desktopimgdownldr.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the desktopimgdownldr utility being used to download a remote file. An adversary may use desktopimgdownldr to download arbitrary files as an alternative to certutil.
